participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and thoughtful, Emily enjoys exploring new ideas and perspectives.
participant_1.background: i'm pregnant with my first child. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i started a new job as a pa three months ago.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Energetic and sociable, Jake thrives in dynamic environments and loves to connect with others.
participant_2.background: in my spare time i do volunteer work. i enjoy being around people. i am a professional wrestler. i volunteer in a homeless shelter.
